name: Granny Christmas Scary House
description:
Christmas Granny is a survival horror game in a scary house. This is the 2020 Christmas version ! enjoy
You are locked inside granny scary house, and you have 5 days to find your way out. Best of Luck.
This is a Christmas version of scary granny game. 
It's both scary and funny, granny is Santa now.

HOW TO PLAY:
* Find keys to open doors 
* grab items that will help you get out
* Try not to make noise, because Santa granny hears you

FEATURES:
- High quality scary sounds.
- Great quality graphics.
- Scary atmosphere.
- Try in the terrifying horror stories and feel the scream noises
